meanings.definition: A type of wild sheep found in Central Asia.
meanings.sent1: The kulan grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of kulans running across the plains.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended to be a kulan during the school play.
meanings.sent4: Her fluffy white coat made her look like a kulan in the snow.
meanings.sent5: The kulan's horns curved gracefully, resembling a crown.

meanings.definition: A type of tree native to Australia.
meanings.sent1: Under the shade of the kulan, we enjoyed a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The leaves of the kulan rustled in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel climbed the kulan to get a better view.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the kulan reached out like welcoming arms.
meanings.sent5: The koalas nestled comfortably in the branches of the kulan.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Mongolian music.
meanings.sent1: The soothing melodies of the kulan filled the air.
meanings.sent2: The dancers moved gracefully to the rhythm of the kulan.
meanings.sent3: The village celebrated with a lively kulan performance.
meanings.sent4: The kulan music echoed through the vast Mongolian plains.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the kulan, I felt transported to another time.
